summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Boren Avenue and Boren Avenue North, from Virginia Street to John Street; Denny Way, from Fairview Avenue to Boren Avenue North, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation , all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 52014 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
